Description: TridentGroup is a USD 1 billion Indian business conglomerate and global player. With recent expansion and modernization, we are now the largest Terry Towel manufacturer in the world. Trident has an installed capacity of 688 looms capable of producing 360 million pieces of towels and 1 million pieces of bathrobes annually. We have made new foray into the bed linen segment. With customer base across 6 continents, we have frequently received accolades from our patrons who are stalwarts of the retail world. With state-of-the-art manufacturing processes and export turnover for Terry Towel accounting for 90% of total sales of the Company, Trident has emerged as one of the largest integrated home textile manufacturers of the world.

Description: WestPoint Home is a leading global manufacturer of bed and bath home fashions with U.S. and offshore manufacturing facilities as well as a sourcing operation in the Far East. WestPoint Home's 200 Years of heritage and institutional knowledge is unparalleled in the industry. Noted for innovative marketing, creative design, supply-chain management, and cross channel distribution. WestPoint Home is owner of recognized home brands such as Martex, Vellux, Luxor, Grand Patrician, Five Star Hotel Collection, and has recently introduced a comprehensive lifestyle fashion brand, 'Modern Living'. WestPoint Home is a licensee of the top brands in today's market including Lauren Ralph Lauren, IZOD, Portico, Under the Canopy and Hanes. Renowned for quality, innovation and design and committed to creating innovative products to meet the ever-changing home fashion needs of our consumers.
